analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma duka tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: Naāsavasampayuttaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā āsavavippayutto kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: na āsava sampayuttam na kusalam dhammam paccayā āsava vippayuttaḥ kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka

original: Naāsavasampayuttaṁ naakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā āsavasampayutto akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na āsava sampayuttam na akusalam dhammam paccayā āsava sampayuttaḥ akusalaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Naāsavasampayuttaṁ naabyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca āsavavippayutto abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na āsava sampayuttam na abyākatam dhammam paṭicca āsava vippayuttaḥ abyākataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi adhipatiyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
